body:
Hey guys.
Here are some things that you may want to know about the tourney:
- Is going to be Double Elimination
- Players in the tourney can't spectate matches.
- We will be using a mixture of OCN and Avicus maps.
- The leaders of the teams please add me on skype; retro_spectrum.
- 8v8 tourney.

The teams that are going to be participating are:
  • iloominatey
  • Bad Company
  • Envy
  • ReJuerte
  • Atomic Warriors
  • Apex 
  • Immunity
  • Fancy Soldiers
  • Avicadian Heroes
  • Cacalmarin
Here is a link to the bracket:
http://challonge.com/racefg

Good Luck!

Note: This tourney will most likely be taking place on Saturday or Sunday.

replies.body:
Bad Company, 
I would like my team to attend the tournament because i think would be a great opportunity to play with my team and to get an idea of how other Avicus teams play before the tournament. It should also be a heap of fun. 

Can we have a date and time for this tournament before i enter my roster for who will attend it because i need to know who would be able to make the tournament so i can pick my team from them. 

I really do wish to attend this tournament, it sounds really fun and interesting, many thanks for organising something like this. Thank you!

replies.body:
I'll break down the brackets to y'all

Round 1 Match 1 (1st Seed): Bad Company V Cacalmarin 

Round 1 Match 2 (2nd Seed): Iloominatey V Atomic Warriors

Round 2 Match 1 (1st Seed): Fancy Soldiers V Winner of Round 1 Match 1 (1st Seed)

Round 2 Match 2 (1st Seed): Apex V Envy

Round 2 Match 3 (2nd Seed): ReJuerte V Winner of Round 1 Match 2 (2nd Seed)

Round 2 Match 4 (2nd Seed): Avicadian Heros V Immunity

Round 3 Match 1 (1st Seed): Winner of Round 2 Match 1 (1st Seed) V Winner of Round 2 Match 2 (1st Seed)

Round 3 Match 2 (2nd Seed): Winner of Round 2 Match 3 (2nd Seed) V Winner of Round 2 Match 4 (2nd Seed)

Semifinals: Winner of Round 3 Match 1 (1st Seed) V Winner of Round 3 Match 2 (2nd Seed)

Finals: Winner of Semifinals V Winner of Losers Bracket

I'll run down the Losers Bracket tomorrow.

Round 2 Match 4 (2nd Seed): Avicadian Heros V Immunity

Round 3 Match 1 (1st Seed): Winner of Round 2 Match 1 (1st Seed) V Winner of Round 2 Match 2 (1st Seed)

Round 3 Match 2 (2nd Seed): Winner of Round 2 Match 3 (2nd Seed) V Winner of Round 2 Match 4 (2nd Seed)

I'll run down the Losers Bracket tomorrow.
